Action.author: mahmanik
Action.body: You can get idea about the project structure from here: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-samples/tree/master/basic-network . It contains the sample chaincode (both in Go and Node), client application written in JS, scripts for generating crypto materials, network configurations and more. Balance-transfer or basic-network is a good place to start with. Both of them a script files (runApp.sh or start.sh) to make the application running.
